sourcesContent:
export default function WelcomeBox({ onCloseWelcome }) { return(
X

Welcome to the Star Wars Planet Explorer!

By navigating using the menu below, you can visit any of the most famous planets from Star Wars. Along the way, you'll learn some very specific information about each one!

And for all you parsec buffs out there, if you consider a parsec a unit of time, we'll get you there in less than 12 of 'em. And if you consider a parsec a measure of distance, by using your current device, you keep the total at a comfortable 0.

) }
